name: geocodeAddressString(_:in:preferredLocale:completionHandler:)
desc: Submits a forward-geocoding requesting using the specified address string and locale information.
declaration:
func geocodeAddressString(_ addressString: String, 
                       in region: CLRegion?, 
          preferredLocale locale: Locale?, 
        completionHandler: @escaping CLGeocodeCompletionHandler)
